description: Defines the format for describing the update frequency of a data source
title: Data Frequency

___avg.description: The average frequency (in ms) for data updates

___min.description: The minimum expected frequency (in ms) for data updates

___max.description: The maximum expected frequency (in ms) for data updates

___split.description: The final component of the data packet name, i.e. the dimension on which data source packets are split.
